articles.content: At EatingWell, we tend to cover the most significant recall events to keep our readers informed on the latest news. This week, more recalls were announced on popular produce items, baked goods and mo… [+3710 chars]

articles.title: Wall Street Rebounds Without Its AI Darling's Boost, King Dollar Maintains Dominance While Bitcoin Defies Gravity: This Week In The Markets - Benzinga
articles.description: Despite widespread anticipation that NVIDIA Corp. (NASDAQ:NVDA)'s quarterly results would dictate Wall Street's year-end trajectory, the stock market delivered a robust weekly rebound — even in the absence of its AI darling.
